question: You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.Write a letter to the parents. In your letterexplain why you would like the jobgive details of why you would be a suitable person to employsay how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: Greetings, I am Saman from Sri Lanka. I am writing this letter with regards to the vacancy advertisement which I read in Australian Sunday Morning on 24th June 2022. I would like to apply for the position that you have mentioned,  "Look after a six-year-old child Kevin". Though I am currently working in Sri Lanka as a preschool teacher, I will be in Australia  next month for an Educational Tour. So, it would be nice if I can stay with you  while looking after your baby.

I am experienced in early childhood education for almost ten years now. Moreover, during my leisure time, I am working in a day-care centre looking after six kids like yours.  So, I hope I am an ideal candidate for the requirement.
During my free time, I  plan to visit the Canberra Museum to collect some information about aboriginals. That is for a lecture, which I am going to deliver after I come back from Australia.
Well let me stop here, I am eagerly waiting for your reply to this letter. If you need more information, please feel free to contact me. Thank you in advance.
